name: Numbers and Shares of Each Political Regime — V-Dem (2019)
title: Numbers and Shares of Each Political Regime — V-Dem (2019)
description:
For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project (v9, 2019), variable "Regimes of the world – the RoW measure (D) (v2x_regime)", classifies each country as one of four possible regimes:

0. Closed autocracy
1. Electoral autocracy
2. Electoral democracy
3. Liberal democracy

The V-Dem Project makes these classifications based on a number of other measures. For details, see p. 254 of their "V-Dem Cookbook v9".

The dataset "Numbers and Shares of Each Political Regime — V-Dem (2019)" was produced entirely from the above classification and contains 13 variables. These variables simply count, for each year 1900–2018, the number and share of each of the four regimes and combinations thereof.

For how this dataset was produced, see this document: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_Xbbxiw-nbSv1dSWHZK36ttsNb7DmuG8.

sources.name: Varieties of Democracy Project (2019, version 9)

2. Electoral democracy

The V-Dem Project makes these classifications based on a number of other measures. For details, see p. 254 of their "V-Dem Cookbook v9".

The dataset "Numbers and Shares of Each Political Regime — V-Dem (2019)" was produced entirely from the above classification and contains 13 variables. These variables simply count, for each year 1900–2018, the number and share of each of the four regimes and combinations thereof.

For how this dataset was produced, see this document: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1_Xbbxiw-nbSv1dSWHZK36ttsNb7DmuG8.

resources.path: Numbers and Shares of Each Political Regime — V-Dem (2019).csv

fields.name: Closed autocracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were closed autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as closed autocracies.

fields.name: Electoral autocracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were electoral autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as electoral autocracies.

fields.name: Electoral democracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were electoral democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as electoral democracies.

fields.name: Liberal democracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were liberal democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as liberal democracies.

fields.name: Total
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the total number of the world's regimes that were classified as one of these four regimes.

fields.name: Autocracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as closed autocracies OR electoral autocracies.

fields.name: Democracies
fields.description:
Number of the world's political regimes that were democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the number of the world's regimes that were classified as electoral democracies OR liberal democracies.

fields.name: Share of closed autocracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were closed autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as closed autocracies.

fields.name: Share of electoral autocracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were electoral autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as electoral autocracies.

fields.name: Share of electoral democracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were electoral democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as electoral democracies.

fields.name: Share of liberal democracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were liberal democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as liberal democracies.

fields.name: Share of autocracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were autocracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as closed autocracies OR electoral autocracies.

fields.name: Share of democracies
fields.description:
Share of the world's political regimes that were democracies in a given year.

For each year 1900–2018, the V-Dem Project classifies each country as one of four possible political regimes: closed autocracy, electoral autocracy, electoral democracy, or liberal democracy. Based on these data, this variable gives, for each year 1900–2018, the share of all regimes classified as electoral democracies OR liberal democracies.
